argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringccatOLD.c | |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |
| 2 |  | ringcidOLD.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | ringcidOLD.o | |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) |
| 4 |  | ringcidOLD.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 5 |  | ringcidOLD.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | ringcidOLD.s | |- S = ( Base ` X ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_ringccatidOLD | |- ( U e. V -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( C e. Cat /\ ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> .1. = ( x e. B |-> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ x = X ) -> ( Base ` x ) = ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ x = X ) -> ( _I |` ( Base ` x ) ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` X ) e. _V |
| 15 |  | #P_resiexg | |- ( ( Base ` X ) e. _V -> ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) e. _V ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ph -> ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) e. _V ) |
| 17 | 10, 13, 5, 16 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) ) |
| 18 | 6 | #P_reseq2i | |- ( _I |` S ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` X ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` S ) ) |
